input.sentences: scraps of paper are gathered to create a pinata .
the pinata is designed in the shape of an animal .
it is hung up for the game .
a stick is used to hit the pinata | with the turn taker hoping to be the one to crack it open .
it breaks into pieces after being struck | and remnants of paper land on the floor .
output.sentences: Mary found paper in the shredder.
She decided to make a pinata with the paper
When it dried, she hung it on the porch.
She invited her friend to join her in hitting the pinata.
When it broke both girls enjoyed the candy.
